mapper.insert: INSERT INTO km_project_insight ( project_id, title, summary, content, tags, rec_creator, rec_create_time, rec_revisor, rec_revise_time, arch_flag ) VALUES ( #{projectId}, #{title}, #{summary}, #{content}, #{tags}, #{recCreator}, NOW(), #{recRevisor}, NOW(), 1 )
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM km_project_insight WHERE id = #{id} AND arch_flag = 1
SELECT * FROM km_project_insight WHERE rec_creator = #{username} AND arch_flag = 1 ORDER BY rec_create_time DESC
mapper.update: UPDATE km_project_insight SET project_id = #{projectId}, title = #{title}, summary = #{summary}, content = #{content}, tags = #{tags}, rec_revisor = #{recRevisor}, rec_revise_time = NOW() WHERE id = #{id} AND arch_flag = 1
UPDATE km_project_insight SET arch_flag = 0, rec_revisor = #{revisor}, rec_revise_time = NOW() WHERE id = #{id} AND arch_flag = 1
